body: That's a good question. I often find myself asking that very question about "Doki Doki Literature Club" and "Conception". Xenoblade Chronicles 2 as well. With so many great girls in that game, I don't get why most of the doujins are yaoi. I have no problem with some yaoi from time to time, but I really like some of the blades, such as Perun and Theory, and I'd love some doujins of them.

poster.username: Monster girl is the best tag

body: why no one make actual doujin with this....
